frontmatter.title: Domain Theory
frontmatter.meta: @inbook{abramsky-jung-domain-theory-1995, author = {Abramsky, Samson and Jung, Achim}, title = {Domain Theory}, year = {1995-04-27}, isbn = {019853762X}, publisher = oup, booktitle = {Handbook of Logic in Computer Science (Vol. 3): Semantic Structures}, pages = {1â€“168}, numpages = {168}, }

mainmatter.p: The Stone adjunction is the one formed by the open set functor \mathcal{O} : \mathbf{Top} \to \mathbf{Frm} and the point functor \mathsf{Pt} : \mathbf{Frm} \to \mathbf{Top}.
Adapted by Ayberk Tosun from the handbook chapter of Abramsky and Jung.
